column4: How much swap space should one use? If I have 1 gig RAM should I have 2 gigs of swap? And if I'm thinking of upgrading to 4 gigs of RAM should I have 8 gigs of swap?
yes it is, you need no more than = your ram
and usually far less unless you want to hibernate
I don't usually hibernate, but I might switch between a lot of vmware or virtual box machines
